entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:31 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
